plethora.core

Class Ple_MeshPipe

  • java.lang.Object
    • plethora.core.Ple_MeshPipe

  • public class Ple_MeshPipe
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a mesh class to generate cylinders or pipes of vector arrays. The class allows to work with different polygonal profiles determining the resulution of the mesh. It also allows for the Mesh export into STL files. Written my Jose Sanchez - 2013 for feedback please contact me at: jomasan@gmail.com
    Author:
    jomasan

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ple_MeshPipe

        public Ple_MeshPipe(processing.core.PApplet _p5)
        Basic constructor. Provide the PApplet refernce. (type 'this'). The Mesh doen't have a specific location, its location is based on points generated by the internal methods.
        Parameters:
        _p5 -

    • Method Detail

      • createPipe

        public void createPipe(Vec3D v1,
              Vec3D v2,
              int numSegments,
              float radius)
        Basic Mesh Pipe Method to create cylinder between 2 points
        Parameters:
        v1 - - start point
        v2 - - end point
        numSegments - - segments of the profile
        radius - - radius of the pipe

      • createPipe

        public void createPipe(Vec3D v1,
              Vec3D v2,
              int numSegments,
              float radius1,
              float radius2)
        Basic Mesh Pipe Method to create cylinder between 2 points with 2 different radius
        Parameters:
        v1 - - start point
        v2 - - end point
        numSegments - - segments of the profile
        radius1 - - starting radius of the pipe
        radius2 - - ending radius of the pipe

                  int numSegments,

        Parameters:
        ptList - - Arraylist of Vectors (Vec3D) to pipe
        numSegments - - segments of the profile
        radius - - radius of the pipe

      • exportToSTL

        public void exportToSTL(java.lang.String name)
        Allows to export mesh, mesh must have been previously generated by some of the pipe methods
        Parameters:
        name - - name of the file to generate

      • resetMesh

        public void resetMesh()
        Clears the Mesh instance of the class. Useful for dynamically updating the mesh generated.

      • createPipeMesh

        public TriangleMesh createPipeMesh(Vec3D v1,
                          Vec3D v2,
                          int numSegments,
                          float radius1,
                          float radius2)
        Basic Mesh Pipe Method to create cylinder between 2 points with 2 different radius, Returns the TriangleMesh Instance.
        Parameters:
        v1 - - start point
        v2 - - end point
        numSegments - - segments of the profile
        radius1 - - starting radius of the pipe
        radius2 - - ending radius of the pipe

      • drawMesh

        public void drawMesh(TriangleMesh myMesh,
            boolean smooth)
        Loops through the mesh and draws the triangles using beginShape method from processing.
        Parameters:
        myMesh - - Mesh instance to be rendered
        smooth - - Smooth on/off.

      • capEnds

        public void capEnds(Vec3D v1,
           Vec3D v2,
           int numSegments,
           Vec3D[] pts)
        Internal method to cap the ends of a mesh pipe between 2 vectors, use in sequence: createVerts, createFaces, capEnds
        Parameters:
        v1 - - Vector 1
        v2 - - Vector 2
        numSegments - - Number of segments for the profile
        pts - - Point array

      • createFaces3

        public void createFaces3(int segX,
                int segY,
                Vec3D[] pts)
        creates the faces of the mesh, use in sequence: createVerts, createFaces, capEnds
        Parameters:
        segX - - number of columns
        segY - - number of rows
        pts - - Point array

      • createFaces4

        public void createFaces4(int segX,
                int segY,
                Vec3D[] pts,
                TriangleMesh m)
        creates the faces of the mesh, variation, use in sequence: createVerts, createFaces, capEnds
        Parameters:
        segX - - number of columns
        segY - - number of rows
        pts - - Point array
        m - - specific mesh instance to add the new faces to.

        public void vLine(Vec3D v1,
         Vec3D v2)
        Simple vector line shortcut for debugging
        Parameters:
        v1 - - vector 1
        v2 - - vector 2

                  Vec3D v2,
                  int numSegments,
                  float radius,
                  float radius2)

        Parameters:
        v1 - - start point
        v2 - - end point
        numSegments - - number of segments in the profile
        radius - - starting radius
        radius2 - - ending radius
